snippet: A new report says government forces are targeting medical personnel, denying treatment to patients from rebel-held areas and using hospitals as torture centers.
abstract: United Nations investigators report that Syrian government forces are targeting medical personnel, denying treatment to patients from rebel-held areas and using hospitals as torture centers.
lead_paragraph: A new report says government forces are targeting medical personnel, denying treatment to patients from rebel-held areas and using hospitals as torture centers.

headline.main: U.N. Reports Syria Uses Hospital Attacks as a ‘Weapon of War’
headline.print_headline: U.N. Reports Syria Uses Hospital Attacks as a ‘Weapon of War’
